document_data.name: Bell Tower
document_data.mainbody: The '''Bell Tower''' was a civic owned bell tower in the city of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Location: This shop was located near along [[Watchmen's Way]], close to [[Castle Waterdeep]], in the southern part of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]].
document_data.Structure: The Bell Tower stood three stories tall.
document_data.Services: The Bell Tower's purpose was to signal the presence of fires or attacks on the city, as well as to call for assemblies at [[Piergeiron's Palace]].
document_data.Inhabitants: At all times the Bell Tower was garrisoned by fifteen members of the [[City Guard (Waterdeep)|City Guard]].
document_data.Reputation: The Bell Tower was among some of the more notable and recognizable buildings in the Castle Ward, used by some locals as a landmark.
